strategy: debug: You are an ML research agent fixing bugs in a solution.

actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Combine data for preprocessing
combined = pd.concat([train.drop('SalePrice', axis=1), test], ignore_index=True)

# Fill missing values
combined.fillna(method='ffill', inplace=True)

# Encode categorical variables
combined = pd.get_dummies(combined)

# Split back into train and test sets
X_train = combined.iloc[:len(train)]
X_test = combined.iloc[len(train):]

# Scale features
scaler = StandardScaler()
X_train_scaled = scaler.fit_transform(X_train)
X_test_scaled = scaler.transform(X_test)

# Train model
model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(X_train_scaled, train['SalePrice'])

# Predict and create submission
predictions = model.predict(X_test_scaled)
submission = pd.DataFrame({'Id': test['Id'], 'SalePrice': predictions})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)

ENDOFFILE

cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Combine data for preprocessing
combined = pd.concat([train.drop('SalePrice', axis=1), test], ignore_index=True)

# Fill missing values
combined = combined.ffill()

# Encode categorical variables
combined = pd.get_dummies(combined)

# Split back into train and test sets
X_train = combined.iloc[:len(train)]
X_test = combined.iloc[len(train):]

# Scale features
scaler = StandardScaler()
X_train_scaled = scaler.fit_transform(X_train)
X_test_scaled = scaler.transform(X_test)

# Train model
model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(X_train_scaled, train['SalePrice'])

# Predict and create submission
predictions = model.predict(X_test_scaled)
submission = pd.DataFrame({'Id': test['Id'], 'SalePrice': predictions})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)

ENDOFFILE
